:"BOOST_MULTIPLIER","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"MAX_RUN_PER_SECOND","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"stakingToken","type":"address"},{"internalType":"address","name":"agentToken","type":"address"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"agentTokenThreshold","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"allocPoint","type":"uint256"}],"name":"addPool","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"pid","type":"uint256"}],"name":"claim","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"pid","type":"uint256"}],"name":"emergencyWithdraw","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"getPoolCount","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"count","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"pid","type":"uint256"}],"name":"getPoolInfo","outputs":[{"components":[{"internalType":"contract IERC20","name":"stakingToken","type":"address"},{"internalType":"contract IRunToken","name":"","type":"address"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"pid","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"allocPoint","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"agentTokenThreshold","type":"uint256"}],"name":"setPool","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"newRate","type":"uint256"}],"name":"setRunPerSecond","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"pid","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"amount","type":"uint256"}],"name":"stake","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"totalAllocPoint","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"newOwner","type":"address"}],"name":"transferOwnership","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"pid","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"amount","type":"uint256"}],"name":"withdraw","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"}],"devdoc":{"details":"Implements MasterChef-style pool management with Synthetix reward accumulator math.      Architecture:        - Multiple pools, each identified by a sequential `pid`        - Each pool has an LP staking token and an optional $AGENT token for boost        - Global emission rate (`runPerSecond`) distributed across pools by `allocPoint`        - Within each pool, rewards distributed by effective stake weight      Patron Multiplier (Virtual Balance):        - If staker holds >= `agentTokenThreshold` of the pool's $AGENT token \u2192 3x boost        - `effectiveAmount = amount * (boosted ? 3 : 1)`        - `totalEffectiveSupply` = sum of all effective amounts in the pool        - The accumulator (`accRunPerShare`) distributes proportional to effective weight        - Same approach as Convex Finance and Curve gauge boosting      Security:        - All external state-changing functions are nonReentrant        - All token transfers use SafeERC20        - Emission rate capped by MAX_RUN_PER_SECOND        - Flash loan boost mitigation: rewards accrue over time, not instantly","errors":{"OwnableInvalidOwner(address)":[{"details":"The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)"}],"OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address)":[{"details":"The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation."}],"ReentrancyGuardReentrantCall()":[{"details":"Unauthorized reentrant call."}],"SafeERC20FailedOperation(address)":[{"details":"An operation with an ERC-20 token failed."}]},"events":{"BoostUpdated(uint256,address,bool)":{"params":{"boosted":"The new boost status","pid":"The pool ID","user":"The user whose boost changed"}},"EmergencyWithdrawn(uint256,address,uint256)":{"params":{"amount":"The LP tokens returned","pid":"The pool ID","user":"The user's address"}},"PoolAdded(uint256,address,address,uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"agentToken":"The $AGENT token address (address(0) if no boost)","agentTokenThreshold":"Minimum $AGENT balance for 3x boost","allocPoint":"The reward allocation weight","pid":"The pool ID (index in the pools array)","stakingToken":"The LP token address"}},"PoolUpdated(uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"agentTokenThreshold":"The new boost threshold","allocPoint":"The new allocation weight","pid":"The pool ID"}},"RewardClaimed(uint256,address,uint256)":{"params":{"pid":"The pool ID","reward":"The $RUN tokens minted to the user","user":"The claimer's address"}},"RunPerSecondUpdated(uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"newRate":"The new emission rate (tokens per second)","oldRate":"The previous emission rate (tokens per second)"}},"Staked(uint256,address,uint256,bool)":{"params":{"amount":"The LP tokens staked","boosted":"Whether the user received the 3x Patron Multiplier","pid":"The pool ID","user":"The staker's address"}},"Withdrawn(uint256,address,uint256)":{"params":{"amount":"The LP tokens withdrawn","pid":"The pool ID","user":"The withdrawer's address"}}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"addPool(address,address,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Only callable by owner. Triggers mass pool update to keep accounting consistent.","params":{"agentToken":"The $AGENT token for boost eligibility (address(0) for no boost)","agentTokenThreshold":"Minimum $AGENT balance for 3x boost","allocPoint":"Reward allocation weight for this pool","stakingToken":"The LP token to stake"}},"claim(uint256)":{"details":"Mints pending rewards to the caller via RunToken.mint()","params":{"pid":"The pool ID to claim from"}},"constructor":{"details":"The deployer becomes the owner. After deployment, the owner should:      1. Ensure StakingRewards has MINTER_ROLE on RunToken      2. Add pools via addPool()","params":{"_runPerSecond":"Initial emission rate (tokens per second, 18 decimals)","_runToken":"The $RUN token contract address (must have mint permission)"}},"emergencyWithdraw(uint256)":{"details":"Forfeits all pending rewards. Use only if normal withdraw is stuck.","params":{"pid":"The pool ID to emergency-withdraw from"}},"getPoolCount()":{"returns":{"count":"The number of pools"}},"getPoolInfo(uint256)":{"params":{"pid":"The pool ID"},"returns":{"info":"The pool's state"}},"getTotalAllocPoint()":{"returns":{"points":"The total allocation points"}},"getUserInfo(uint256,address)":{"params":{"account":"The user's address","pid":"The pool ID"},"returns":{"info":"The user's staking state"}},"owner()":{"details":"Returns the address of the current owner."},"pendingReward(uint256,address)":{"params":{"account":"The user's address","pid":"The pool ID"},"returns":{"pending":"The unclaimed $RUN reward amount"}},"refreshBoost(uint256)":{"details":"Call this if your $AGENT token balance changed since your last stake/claim.      Harvests pending rewards, then recalculates effective stake weight.","params":{"pid":"The pool ID to refresh boost for"}},"renounceOwnership()":{"details":"Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner."},"setPool(uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Only callable by owner. Triggers mass pool update.","params":{"agentTokenThreshold":"The new minimum $AGENT balance for boost","allocPoint":"The new allocation weight","pid":"The pool ID to update"}},"setRunPerSecond(uint256)":{"details":"Only callable by owner. Triggers mass pool update. Capped by MAX_RUN_PER_SECOND.","params":{"newRate":"The new emission rate in $RUN per second (18 decimals)"}},"stake(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Claims any pending rewards before adding the new stake. Checks agent token      balance to determine boost eligibility on entry.","params":{"amount":"The number of LP tokens to stake","pid":"The pool ID to stake in"}},"transferOwnership(address)":{"details":"Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner."},"withdraw(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Claims any pending rewards before removing the stake. Rechecks boost status      on the remaining balance.","params":{"amount":"The number of LP tokens to withdraw","pid":"The pool ID to withdraw from"}}},"title":"StakingRewards","version":1},"userdoc":{"errors":{"ExceedsMaxEmissionRate()":[{"notice":"Emission rate exceeds safety cap"}],"InsufficientStake()":[{"notice":"Withdrawing more LP tokens than the user has staked"}],"NothingToClaim()":[{"notice":"No pending rewards to claim"}],"PoolAlreadyExists()":[{"notice":"Attempting to add a pool with a staking token that already has a pool"}],"PoolNotFound()":[{"notice":"Pool ID does not exist"}],"ZeroAddress()":[{"notice":"Address parameter is the zero address"}],"ZeroAmount()":[{"notice":"Amount parameter is zero"}]},"events":{"BoostUpdated(uint256,address,bool)":{"notice":"Emitted when a user's boost status changes via refreshBoost()"},"EmergencyWithdrawn(uint256,address,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when a user emergency-withdraws (forfeiting rewards)"},"PoolAdded(uint256,address,address,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when a new staking pool is added"},"PoolUpdated(uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when a pool's parameters are updated"},"RewardClaimed(uint256,address,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when a user claims $RUN rewards"},"RunPerSecondUpdated(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when the global $RUN emission rate is changed"},"Staked(uint256,address,uint256,bool)":{"notice":"Emitted when a user stakes LP tokens"},"Withdrawn(uint256,address,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when a user withdraws LP tokens"}},"kind":"user","methods":{"ACC_PRECISION()":{"notice":"Precision scalar for `accRunPerShare` to prevent truncation"},"BOOST_MULTIPLIER()":{"notice":"Patron Multiplier applied to stakers holding sufficient $AGENT tokens"},"MAX_RUN_PER_SECOND()":{"notice":"Safety cap for emission rate (10 RUN per second)"},"addPool(address,address,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Add a new staking pool"},"claim(uint256)":{"notice":"Claim pending $RUN rewards from a pool"},"constructor":{"notice":"Deploy the StakingRewards contract"},"emergencyWithdraw(uint256)":{"notice":"Emergency withdraw LP tokens without caring about rewards"},"getPoolCount()":{"notice":"Get the total number of staking pools"},"getPoolInfo(uint256)":{"notice":"Get a pool's configuration and state"},"getTotalAllocPoint()":{"notice":"Get the sum of all pool allocation points"},"getUserInfo(uint256,address)":{"notice":"Get a user's staking info in a pool"},"pendingReward(uint256,address)":{"notice":"Calculate pending $RUN rewards for a user in a decimals)"},"runToken()":{"notice":"The $RUN token contract (mints rewards on-demand)"},"setPool(uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Update a pool's allocation weight and boost Multiplier for $AGENT token holders.","version":1}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"contracts/src/StakingRewards.sol":"StakingRewards"},"evmVersion":"cancun","libraries":{},"metadata":{"bytecodeHash":"ipfs"},"optimizer":{"enabled":true,"runs":200},"remappings":[":@openzeppelin/contracts/=contracts/lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/",":erc4626-tests/=contracts/lib/openzeppelin-contracts/lib/erc4626-tests/",":forge-std/=contracts/lib/forge-std/src/",":halmos-cheatcodes/=contracts/lib/openzeppelin-contracts/lib/halmos-cheatcodes/src/",":openzeppelin-contracts/=contracts/lib/openzeppelin-contracts/"],"viaIR":true},"sources":{"contracts/lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/access/Ownable.sol":{"keccak256":"0xff6d0bb2e285473e5311d9d3caacb525ae3538a80758c10649a4d61029b017bb","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://8ed324d3920bb545059d66ab97d43e43ee85fd3bd52e03e401f020afb0b120f6","dweb:/ipfs/QmfEckWLmZkDDcoWrkEvMWhms66xwTLff9DDhegYpvHo1a"]},"contracts/lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/interfaces/IERC1363.sol":{"keccak256":"0xd5ea07362ab630a6a3dee4285a74cf2377044ca2e4be472755ad64d7c5d4b69d","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://da5e832b40fc5c3145d3781e2e5fa60ac2052c9d08af7e300dc8ab80c4343100","dweb:/ipfs/QmTzf7N5ZUdh5raqtzbM11yexiUoLC9z3Ws632MCuycq1d"]},"contracts/lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/interfaces/IERC165.sol":{"keccak256":"0x0afcb7e740d1537b252cb2676f600465ce6938398569f09ba1b9ca240dde2dfc","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://1c299900ac4ec268d4570ecef0d697a3013cd11a6eb74e295ee3fbc945056037","dweb:/ipfs/Qmab9owJoxcA7vJT5XNayCMaUR1qxqj1NDzzisduwaJMcZ"]},"contracts/lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/interfaces/IERC20.sol":{"keccak256":"0x1a6221315ce0307746c2c4827c125d821ee796c74a676787762f4778671d4f44","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://1bb2332a7ee26dd0b0de9b7fe266749f54820c99ab6a3bcb6f7e6b751d47ee2d","dweb:/ipfs/QmcRWpaBeCYkhy68PR3B4AgD7asuQk7PwkWxrvJbZcikLF"]},"contracts/lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/token/ERC20/IERC20.sol":{"keccak256":"0x74ed01eb66b923d0d0cfe3be84604ac04b76482a55f9dd655e1ef4d367f95bc2","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://5282825a626cfe924e504274b864a652b0023591fa66f06a067b25b51ba9b303","dweb:/ipfs/QmeCfPykghhMc81VJTrHTC7sF6CRvaA1FXVq2pJhwYp1dV"]},"contracts/lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/token/ERC20/utils/SafeERC20.sol":{"keccak256":"0x304d732678032a9781ae85c8f204c8fba3d3a5e31c02616964e75cfdc5049098","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://299ced486011781dc98f638059678323c03079fefae1482abaa2135b22fa92d0","dweb:/ipfs/QmbZNbcPTBxNvwChavN2kkZZs7xHhYL7mv51KrxMhsMs3j"]},"contracts/lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/Context.sol":{"keccak256":"0x493033a8d1b176a037b2cc6a04dad01a5c157722049bbecf632ca876224dd4b2","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://6a708e8a5bdb1011c2c381c9a5cfd8a9a956d7d0a9dc1bd8bcdaf52f76ef2f12","dweb:/ipfs/Qmax9WHBnVsZP46ZxEMNRQpLQnrdE4dK8LehML1Py8FowF"]},"contracts/lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/ReentrancyGuard.sol":{"keccak256":"0xa516cbf1c7d15d3517c2d668601ce016c54395bf5171918a14e2686977465f53","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://1e1d079e8edfb58efd23a311e315a4807b01b5d1cf153f8fa2d0608b9dec3e99","dweb:/ipfs/QmTBExeX2SDTkn5xbk5ssbYSx7VqRp9H4Ux1CY4uQM4b9N"]},"contracts/lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/StorageSlot.sol":{"keccak256":"0xcf74f855663ce2ae00ed8352666b7935f6cddea2932fdf2c3ecd30a9b1cd0e97","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://9f660b1f351b757dfe01438e59888f31f33ded3afcf5cb5b0d9bf9aa6f320a8b","dweb:/ipfs/QmarDJ5hZEgBtCmmrVzEZWjub9769eD686jmzb2XpSU1cM"]},"contracts/lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/introspection/IERC165.sol":{"keccak256":"0x8891738ffe910f0cf2da09566928589bf5d63f4524dd734fd9cedbac3274dd5c","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://971f954442df5c2ef5b5ebf1eb245d7105d9fbacc7386ee5c796df1d45b21617","dweb:/ipfs/QmadRjHbkicwqwwh61raUEapaVEtaLMcYbQZWs9gUkgj3u"]},"contracts/src/StakingRewards.sol":{"keccak256":"0x5d3c91e01b35415dcb6542ea1c835df5fe9440a2963682978b9286296bcf36ad","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://0eb5c16e76de6731c4b7f20ee7d6bbbe48b17cf62aea923f96588dc38b859fa6","dweb:/ipfs/QmagEMTFCh9vPhE3V3PcHorD7Y1sAZpKrXKUiFp14xTumJ"]},"contracts/src/interfaces/IStakingRewards.sol":{"keccak256":"0x7dfdd8fbad5a8cf5d6f4bc8f865a2ba64265f623a036154004cbf4aad6e6c515","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://a7800cc5430749d69e41d0fa36a180bf1ca356375478b33aedf954482e5efa4a","dweb:/ipfs/QmaDTUw1J2iV1BSSJibBDAZT6wxJsMc5edSMVkGcernK9c"]}},"version":1}

addPool(address,address,uint256,uint256).details: Only callable by owner. Triggers mass pool update to keep accounting consistent.

params.agentToken: The $AGENT token for boost eligibility (address(0) for no boost)
params.allocPoint: Reward allocation weight for this pool

claim(uint256).details: Mints pending rewards to the caller via RunToken.mint()

params.pid: The pool ID to claim from

constructor.details: The deployer becomes the owner. After deployment, the owner should:      1. Ensure StakingRewards has MINTER_ROLE on RunToken      2. Add pools via addPool()

params._runPerSecond: Initial emission rate (tokens per second, 18 decimals)
params._runToken: The $RUN token contract address (must have mint permission)

emergencyWithdraw(uint256).details: Forfeits all pending rewards. Use only if normal withdraw is stuck.

params.pid: The pool ID to emergency-withdraw from

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

refreshBoost(uint256).details: Call this if your $AGENT token balance changed since your last stake/claim.      Harvests pending rewards, then recalculates effective stake weight.

params.pid: The pool ID to refresh boost for

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setPool(uint256,uint256,uint256).details: Only callable by owner. Triggers mass pool update.

params.agentTokenThreshold: The new minimum $AGENT balance for boost

setRunPerSecond(uint256).details: Only callable by owner. Triggers mass pool update. Capped by MAX_RUN_PER_SECOND.

params.newRate: The new emission rate in $RUN per second (18 decimals)

stake(uint256,uint256).details: Claims any pending rewards before adding the new stake. Checks agent token      balance to determine boost eligibility on entry.

params.amount: The number of LP tokens to stake
params.pid: The pool ID to stake in

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdraw(uint256,uint256).details: Claims any pending rewards before removing the stake. Rechecks boost status      on the remaining balance.

params.amount: The number of LP tokens to withdraw
params.pid: The pool ID to withdraw from

ACC_PRECISION().notice: Precision scalar for `accRunPerShare` to prevent truncation

BOOST_MULTIPLIER().notice: Patron Multiplier applied to stakers holding sufficient $AGENT tokens

MAX_RUN_PER_SECOND().notice: Safety cap for emission rate (10 RUN per second)

claim(uint256).notice: Claim pending $RUN rewards from a pool

emergencyWithdraw(uint256).notice: Emergency withdraw LP tokens without caring about rewards

getPoolCount().notice: Get the total number of staking pools

getPoolInfo(uint256).notice: Get a pool's configuration and state

getTotalAllocPoint().notice: Get the sum of all pool allocation points

getUserInfo(uint256,address).notice: Get a user's staking info in a pool

pendingReward(uint256,address).notice: Calculate pending $RUN rewards for a user in a pool

refreshBoost(uint256).notice: Update boost status based on current agent token balance

runPerSecond().notice: Global $RUN emission rate (tokens per second, 18 decimals)

setPool(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: Update a pool's allocation weight and boost threshold

stake(uint256,uint256).notice: Stake LP tokens into a pool to earn $RUN rewards

totalAllocPoint().notice: Sum of all pool allocation points

withdraw(uint256,uint256).notice: Withdraw LP tokens from a pool
